oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Memphis Zoo Monkey Mound
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Monkey Mound, Overton Park, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image.

“An oval moat, 27 ½ ft. wide and 491 ft. in circumference, surrounds the island mound which slopes up from the water to a 20 ft. peak. Rustic stone entrances give access to the monkey quarters in the mound’s interior. A hallway 58 ft. long, leads to the monkey apartments, 7 rooms, each 4 x 6, with shelves for beds.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis Zoo; Overton Park; parks; animals; midtown;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Bluff City News Co., Memphis, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: E. C. Kropp Co., Milwaukee, Wis.; Collection processed by Angela Price
